text: The Communist () is a 1958 Soviet drama movie directed by Yuli Raizman.АфишаКоммунист It stars Yevgeni Urbansky, Sofia Pavlova, and Boris Smirnov. == Actors == * Yevgeni Urbansky as Vasili Gubanov * Sofia Pavlova as Anyuta Fokina * Boris Smirnov as Lenin * Yevgeni Shutov as Fyodor Fokin * Sergei Yakovlev as Denis Ivanovich * Valentin Zubkov as Stepan == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1958 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yuli Raizman
title: The Communist (movie)
